function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence of virus stability on temperature","Impact":"Potential for ineffective cleaning and decontamination","Mitigation":"Provide hot water of at least 70C for cleaning purposes, use steam for sterilization, and ensure proper disposal protocols","Technologies":"Hot water systems, steam sterilization techniques","People":"Staff, patients, hospital personnel","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Inadequate disposal protocols for medical waste","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and spread of infectious pathogens","Mitigation":"Implement relevant disposal protocols, utilize high temperature incineration for COVID-19 medical waste, and establish detailed waste packaging and pretreatment protocols","Technologies":"High temperature incineration, waste packaging protocols, disinfection systems","People":"Environmental health and safety regulators, waste management personnel","Owner":"Facility management team, waste management personnel"},{"Description":"Lack of futureproofing in asset management practice","Impact":"Inefficient asset management and failure to meet stakeholder requirements","Mitigation":"Embed futureproofing in asset management, adopt standardized approaches, establish assessment criteria, and take necessary actions to maintain future-proofing agenda","Technologies":"Asset management tools, standardized approaches, assessment criteria","People":"Facility managers, asset management professionals, stakeholders","Owner":"Facility management team, asset management professionals"}]}
